items.value: Oh hey, you're awake! Welcome to your new worst nightmare.
You'll notice your oxygen is running low. Thanks to me, I found water! Blue floating globs - probability 0.00000000000007676% repeating...
I'm boring you, aren't I? Point is: jump off and grab blue water globs for oxygen. Don't die!
Excellent! You're not completely hopeless. Keep going!
Two down! One more and you'll understand the concept.
Well done! You've grasped the basics. Now we need something more sustainable than my brilliant water-finding skills.
60 seconds left! Those blue globs aren't going to collect themselves!
Well, that was predictable. You're dead. Try again?
Water collected! +30 seconds of not dying.
